Events that occurred on 15 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Ronald Eames.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 167.
1975 - Mythcon 6 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
1976 - Mythcon 7 in Sacramento, California.
1982 - Mythcon 13 at Chapman College in Orange, California.
1983 - Mythcon 14 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
2005 - The Tolkien Society's Tolkien 2005 conference in Birmingham, England.
2008 - Mythcon 39 at Central Connecticut State University in New Britain, Connecticut.
2010 - "Edge of the Wild", Tolkien art exhibition in Moreton-in-Marsh, England.
2023 - Tolkien Calendar 2024 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
Treebeard releases Saruman from his imprisonment in Orthanc.[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, The Lord of the Rings, Appendix B, "The Chief Days from the Fall of Barad-dûr to the End of the Third Age"
